system.effect: With a terrible snapping sound, the heat of the attack boils the marrow in the target’s arm, causing it to crack or even shatter. The target suffers [[1d5]] levels of Fatigue and is Stunned for 1 round. His arm is Useless until it is repaired.

description.value:
Energy Damage to Arm (Severity 7)

With a terrible snapping sound, the heat of the attack boils the marrow in the target’s arm, causing it to crack or even shatter. The target suffers [[1d5]] levels of Fatigue and is Stunned for 1 round. His arm is Useless until it is repaired.
